content: Do you have any jokes about fitness?

Sure, here's one for you: 

Why don't some couples go to the gym? 

Because some relationships don't work out! 

But seriously, exercise is important for maintaining a healthy lifestyle. It's great for both physical and mental well-being. So, even if going to the gym isn't your thing, there are plenty of other ways to stay active and fit. What kind of fitness activities do you enjoy?
